AbstractClient - Class in ocsf
The AbstractClient contains all the methods necessary to set up the client side of a client-server architecture.
AbstractClient(String, int) - Constructor for class ocsf.AbstractClient
Constructs the client.
AbstractServer - Class in ocsf
The AbstractServer class maintains a thread that waits for connection attempts from clients.
AbstractServer(int) - Constructor for class ocsf.AbstractServer
Constructs a new server.
accept(ClientRequestDataContainer) - Method in class client.ClientMainControl
Sends a request message to the server through the client communication.

AdaptableClient - Class in ocsf
The AdaptableClient is a class that extends the AbstractClient in place of the ObservableClient .
AdaptableClient(String, int, ObservableClient) - Constructor for class ocsf.AdaptableClient
Constructs the client adapter.
AdaptableServer - Class in ocsf
The AdaptableServer is an adapter class that extends the AbstractServer class in place of the AbstractObservableServer .
AdaptableServer(int, ObservableServer) - Constructor for class ocsf.AdaptableServer
Constructs the server adapter.
